artist: Author: Freek Lomme , et al.; Printer: Coers & Roest ArtLibro, Arnhem, Netherlands; Publisher: Onomatopee Projects, Eindhoven, Netherlands

description: Perfect bound volume, designs, letterpress text, and digital illustration of abstracted signs reading "YOU NEED MORE SNEAKERS" printed in color offset lithography on neobond covers; 236 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: We are the Market
